title: GraphQL Bidder
description: A realtime bidder that uses GraphQL subscriptions to update the UI in realtime. The bidder is built usingReact, Prisma, Postgres Apollo Client, GraphQL, and NodeJS.

title: L`Assiette Restaurant
description: A restaurant website built using NextJS, Typescript, PostgreSQL and SaSS. for french dishes and allows users to order food online

title: Resume Maker
description: A free online tool to help you create a professional resume in minutes. The tool is built using NodeJs and Typescript

title: My Portfolio
description: My portfolio website built using GatsbyJS, Typescript, and SaSS.The website is hosted on Netlify.

title: CareCircle
description: A web application that allows users to create a circle of friends and family to help them in case of an emergency. The application is built using React, Typescript, and SaSS.
